headline: Salesforce, Inc. (CRM): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Salesforce, Inc. (CRM) on Twitter by TechFundies. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on CRM. Salesforce, Inc. (CRM)’s share was trading at $284.58 as of March 12th. CRM’s trailing and forward P/E were 44.75 and 25.58 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Salesforce (CRM) reported a lackluster […]
